name: Balance (itch) (pampogokiraly)
description:
My submission to the ThreeButtonJam.

The game is about balancing the population of five different races.
You lose if one of the races die out, or overpopulate.

Each card represents an event, and you need to decide on where to place each of them.
You will keep cycling your deck, and at the end of each cycle, you add a new card.

Because of real life issues, I did not have all ten days to work on the game. And on top of that, I've made multiple stupid decisions while I did have time to work on it.
So the game is very much in an incomplete state, and I have no plans on properly finishing it.
